    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public void execute(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                    javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
             throws javax.servlet.ServletException,
                    java.io.IOException
        Blocks a lot in an application.
        The method expects "lotId" and "userRole" parameters with the values.

        In the event of an error, a redirect to the error page occurs.
        If a user doesn't have administrator privileges, a redirect to the access denied page occurs.
        Specified by:
        execute in interface ServletCommand
        Parameters:
        request - - a request with the command required parameters
        response - - a response of a command.
        Throws:
        javax.servlet.ServletException - - if an error occurred during operation.
        java.io.IOException - - if an IO error occurred during operation.
